datasource.sql: select ID,BRANCH,STAFF_ID,FIO,LOGNAME,PARTNER_ID,TYPE_ID,TYPE_NAME,TYPE_OBJ_NAME, P_RNK,P_RNK_NAME,P_RNK_OKPO,P_ACTIVE,PT_LIMIT_SUM,PT_LIMIT_SUM_PERC,PT_ACTIVE, null as SER, null as NUM, DATE_OFF + 1 as DATE_ON, DATE_OFF + 1 + (DATE_OFF - DATE_ON) as DATE_OFF, null as SUM,INSU_TARIFF, null as INSU_SUM, RNK, RNK_TYPE, RNK_NMK, RNK_OKPO, GRT_ID,GRT_TYPE_ID,GRT_DEAL_NUM,GRT_DEAL_DATE,GRT_DEAL_NAME,GRT_NAME,ND, RENEW_NEED,RENEW_NEWID,RENEW_ALERTDAYS, PAY_FREQ from V_INS_DEALS where id = :deal_id
